lines: Well met! After much consideration, I have decided to help you and the Mogmenders with the renovation of Bahrr Lehs. If you need anything, big or small, then I am the dragon to ask!
In case you have yet to notice, a friend of mine has offered to help. He would not take no for an answer! If ever you need to call on Whei Ahf, ask him for assistance!

I have little experience with the tools of man, but even I can tell that the Mogmenders' work has improved since you crafted them new ones! Still, I am glad that all I will ever need is my keen claws.
Gullinbursti has seen fit to let us stay in Bahrr Lehs! Naturally, that must mean our work here is finished, right? It is time to plan a celebration!
I cannot believe we managed to make the plaza even more glorious! Truly, it fills me with pride to think that I had a part in this!
Forename! Mogzin told me you had a great feast, and danced night and day! And no one could be bothered to tell me? The mighty Ohl Deeh will not overlook this dishonor!
Yes, Mogzin will feel a roar so mighty it will knock the pom clear from his head!

obj.n: 明日を見すえる修復団！
